attributes.additional_details:
Britain is facing great problems with immigration but not everyone wants to remain in Britain.
It will slash Benefit payments and create job vacancies.
This e-petition is for every person living in the UK legally and holding a British Passport and Immigrants with or without being granted the right to stay.

The lump sum is to be decided upon a range of categories that will be attractive to a range of people and age groups.

Not for Europeans who have the right to remain in Britain due to EC regulations.

It is a chance to leave Great Britain voluntarily.
AGE...it could offer early retirement to many people.
Offer anyone thinking of emigrating to another country an incentive to leave via a lump sum.
Unemployed, immigrants, 'old people'
Offer every British Passport Holder and Immigrants  a lump sum to leave the UK. Sorry not Europeans.
T&C, No return before 15 years.
